Package org.restsql.core.impl

Contains core framework implementation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ColumnMetaDataImpl Represents column (field) metadata.
ConnectionFactoryImpl Creates jdbc connections using database.xxx properties in the database.properties file.
RequestFactoryImpl Creates requests.
RequestImpl Represents a restSQL request.
RequestLoggerFactoryImpl  
RequestLoggerImpl Logs requests for access, error and trace logs.
Serializer  
SqlBuilder Builds SQL for an operation on a SQL Resource.
SqlResourceFactoryImpl Manages SQL Resource construction.
SqlResourceImpl Represents a SQL Resource, an queryable and updatable database "view".
SqlResourceMetaData Represents meta data for sql resource.
TableMetaDataImpl Encapsulates table information for an SQL Resource.
TriggerManager Manages trigger instantiation and execution.
 

Package org.restsql.core.impl Description

Contains core framework implementation.
